availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Walter Agnew (Henderson County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Whitfield Agnew and Elizabeth Nunn Agnew. Resident of Henderson County in 1850, 1860, and 1862.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2, p. 322; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 55; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Henderson, p. 23; Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1912, Henderson County, Kentucky, file no. 1271.
